title: A Middle-aged Man Who Returned From Another World Becomes Unrivaled In The Apocalyptic World - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Apocalypse   Cheats   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Returning from Another World   Transported to Another World   Zombies
author: Habanero   羽々音色
description:
The protagonist, Yanagi Azami, who has been transferred to another world, becomes a member of a party of heroes as a “Samurai,” a unique class that specializes in close combat, and defeated the Demon King at the end of his journey.

He then returned to Japan, only to find an apocalyptic world full of zombies.>
